metadata.title: CVE-2019-19721 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - low
metadata.description: An off-by-one error in the DecodeBlock function in codec/sdl_image.c inVideoLAN VLC media player before 3.0.9 allows remote attackers to cause adenial of service (memory corruption) via a crafted image file. NOTE: thismay be related to the SDL_Image product.

criterions.comment: vlc: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
